profile.name: Aur√©lien Sberro
profile.headline: Developer
profile.bio: Passionate developer building side projects and exploring new technologies.

projects.name: Meteo Score
projects.description: A comprehensive system for collecting, analyzing, and scoring meteorological forecasts.
projects.fullDescription: Meteo Score compares weather predictions from various sources against actual observations to provide accuracy metrics and insights. Built with Python/FastAPI backend, Solid.js frontend, and PostgreSQL database.

projects.name: Quickr
projects.description: A modern URL shortener with a clean UI built with Go and HTMX.
projects.fullDescription: Quickr is a URL shortener featuring inline editing, real-time search, click statistics, hot links tracking, and dark mode support. Entirely vibe-coded with AI assistance.

projects.name: Quickr Jump
projects.description: Browser extension for fast keyword-based URL shortcuts.
projects.fullDescription: A Firefox & Chrome extension (Manifest V3) for omnibox shortcuts. Type 'q' then Space, followed by text to quickly navigate to your short URLs.

projects.name: Sarouels Mocassins
projects.description: An application entirely vibe-coded by AI, without any manually written code.
projects.fullDescription: A project showcasing AI-driven development, built with Go and Docker. Demonstrates the potential of AI pair programming.

projects.name: Wind Wise
projects.description: A modern Next.js application with server components and Drizzle ORM.
projects.fullDescription: Wind Wise features Next.js App Router, Server Components, Server Actions, TypeScript, and Vercel Postgres integration for type-safe database queries.

projects.name: Airtime
projects.description: A project currently in development, not yet deployed.
projects.fullDescription: Airtime is a work-in-progress application. More details coming soon.
